title: Shantinagar (neighbourhood)
content: Shantinagar (Bengali: শান্তিনগর) is an upscale neighbourhood[1][2][3] located in Dhaka, the capital of Bangladesh.[4][5] It is under the Paltan Thana.[6] Shantinagar is administered by Dhaka South City Corporation.[7] It is also one of the busiest areas in Dhaka. Its neighbouring areas are Bailey Road, Siddeshwari, Segunbagicha, Paltan, Rajarbagh and Kakrail. Numerous shops, pharmacies, restaurants and salons can be found in Shantinagar.[8][9] Eastern Plus Shopping Complex is also located in Shantinagar which is a well-known place for shopping around the locality. The Rajarbagh Police Lines are located near Shantinagar.
